text: A long time passed after the Lord made Israel secure from all their enemies, and Joshua was very old.

So <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="07121" class="">summoned</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>, including the <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st>, <st data-num="07218" class="">rulers</st>, <st data-num="08199" class="">judges</st>, and <st data-num="07860" class="">leaders</st>, and <st data-num="0559 0413">told</st> them: “<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="02204" class="">am</st> <st data-num="0935 03117">very</st> <st data-num="02204" class="">old</st>.
You saw everything the Lord your God did to all these nations on your behalf, for the Lord your God fights for you.

<st data-num="07200" class="">See</st>, I have <st data-num="05307" class="">parceled</st> <st data-num="05159" class="">out</st> to your <st data-num="07626" class="">tribes</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="07604" class="">remaining</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> to the <st data-num="01419" class="">Mediterranean</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">Sea</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03996 08121">in the west</st>, including <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01471 0834">nations</st> I <st data-num="03772" class="">defeated</st>.<n id="3" />
The Lord your God will drive them out from before you and remove them, so you can occupy their land as the Lord your God promised you.

<st data-num="02388" class="">Be</st> <st data-num="03966" class="">very</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">strong</st>! <st data-num="08104" class="">Carefully</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">obey</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> that is <st data-num="03789" class="">written</st> in the <st data-num="08451" class="">law</st> <st data-num="05612" class="">scroll</st> of <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st> so you <st data-num="01115" class="">won’t</st> <st data-num="05493" class="">swerve</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> it to the <st data-num="03225" class="">right</st> or the <st data-num="08040" class="">left</st>,

<st data-num="01115" class="">or</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">associate</st> with <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> that <st data-num="07604" class="">remain</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">near</st><n id="1" /> you. You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02142" class="">invoke</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="07650" class="">make solemn declarations</st> by the <st data-num="08034" class="">names</st> of their <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st>!<n id="2" /> You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05647" class="">worship</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="07812" class="">bow down</st> to them!
But you must be loyal to the Lord your God, as you have been to this very day.
“The Lord drove out from before you great and mighty nations; no one has been able to resist you to this very day.
One of you makes a thousand run away, for the Lord your God fights for you, as he promised you he would.
Watch yourselves carefully! Love the Lord your God!

<st data-num="03588" class="">But</st> <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="07725" class="">ever</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">turn away</st> and <st data-num="01692" class="">make alliances</st> with<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03499 0428">these</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> that <st data-num="07604" class="">remain</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">near</st> you,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="02859" class="">intermarry</st> with them and <st data-num="0935 01992">establish friendly relations</st> with them,<n id="3" />

know for certain that the Lord your God will no longer drive out these nations from before you. They will trap and ensnare you; they will be a whip that tears your sides and thorns that blind your eyes until you disappear from this good land the Lord your God gave you.

“Look, today I am about to die. You know with all your heart and being that not even one of all the faithful promises the Lord your God made to you is left unfulfilled; every one was realized—not one promise is unfulfilled!

But in the same way that every faithful promise the Lord your God made to you has been realized, it is just as certain that if you disobey, then the Lord will bring on you every judgment until he destroys you from this good land that the Lord your God gave you.

If you violate the covenantal laws of the Lord your God which he commanded you to keep, and you follow, worship, and bow down to other gods, then the Lord will be very angry with you and you will disappear quickly from the good land that he gave to you.”
